result.arabic_text: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ
result.translation: Nta n’ikintu na kimwe kinyegejwe ibiremwa mw’ijuru no mw’isi, kiretse ko kiri mu Gitabu nyezina “Lawhu Mahfuudhw” gitomora kigahetura vyose ku Mana Allah; vyaba ari ivyo muri kahise canke muri kazoza.
